How to create custom parking pages in DNSMan

Brief guidelines for using your existing static parking page in DNSMan

Let's cut into the flesh with an example.

Assume you were tasked with creating a parking page for N2V-owned sites. You should proceed as follows:

  • Create a design in your favorite creative software package, share it with stakeholders, until you have acquired their approval
  • Implement the design using good standard XHTML, adding additional resources such as CSS Stylesheets and Images

Once you have done that, your parking page should be displayable perfectly in your browser. In the next steps we will see how to upload it into DNSMan:

  • Go to DNSMan administration panel, and Add a new parking page
